name: Space shooter: Galaxy Hero
description:
- Captain! We are in danger!

We need your help! Our galaxy is attacked by alien shooter👽👽👽

- The alien invaders beat our squad, they destroyed all of galactica! Space team is waiting for your order! Please command ship to protect the galaxy and the surrounding asteroids.

If you are a big fan of shooting game with the new modern combat, and want to bring the freedom in the galaxy games, so Space shooter: Galaxy Hero is perfect game for you. With classic free space games genre, old game with a new context, Space shooter: Galaxy attack puts you on fire with infinity space shooting. You will be faced lots of evil enemies and deal with many striker bosses in galaxy wars. Are you sure you will survival in the war of alien shooter?

👍FEATURE

-  Perfect Shoot ‘em up: Remember to survival!

- infinity alien shooting!

-  powered up

- Stunning designs, amazing lighting and special effects.

- earn coin and money 

👍HOW TO PLAY

- Move spaceship

- Kill space intruders

- Slide to control your spaceship dodge enemy's bullets.

- Remember using blue power-up item, booster item to level up easier.

The Galaxy's future is now in your hands. Get your ship ready for space attack in this galaxy shooter game
